amendment.description: To improve section 3120, relating to local stakeholder organizations for Department of Energy Environmental Management 2006 closure sites.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3211 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3211 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5787) To improve section 3120, relating to local stakeholder organizations for Department of Energy Environmental Management 2006 closure sites.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3211 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3211 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
